message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $18000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm looking to get at least my minimum price of $15000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'd like to get as close to my budget as possible.

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I have to consider my own minimum price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offers, which would be $16000. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $15500, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. Can you consider meeting me at $15000?

I can see that you're getting closer to my minimum price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $16000. I'm willing to make a compromise, so I'll meet you at $16000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer in this range.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $15750, but I'm still hoping to get a better price. Can you consider meeting me at $15500?
